malangizo kuzungulira: Masitepe omwe CPU amatsata kuti achite malangizo amodzi
superscalar zomangamanga: Mapangidwe a CPU omwe amatha kutsata malangizo angapo pa wotchi iliyonse
kuneneratu kwa nthambi: Njira pomwe CPU imayesa kuganiza kuti chotsatira chidzapita
northbridge: Chipset (makina akale) omwe adalumikiza CPU ku RAM ndi mabasi othamanga kwambiri
southbridge: Chipset (makina akale) omwe ankagwira zotumphukira pang'onopang'ono ndi I/O
hyperthreading: Tekinoloje yolola kuti CPU imodzi core kuwoneka ngati ma cores angapo omveka
risc: Kuchepetsa Malangizo Set Computer - kapangidwe ka CPU ndi malangizo osavuta
cisc: Complex Instruction Set Computer - Mapangidwe a CPU okhala ndi malangizo amphamvu, ovuta
simd: Single Instruction Multiple Data, njira yosinthira deta mogwirizana
microarchitecture: Tsatanetsatane wa kukhazikitsidwa kwa malangizo a CPU
dongosolo pa chip: Kuphatikiza zigawo zingapo (CPU, GPU, ndi zina) pa chip chimodzi
dongosolo lophatikizidwa: Makina apakompyuta odzipereka ku ntchito inayake, nthawi zambiri mkati mwa chipangizo chokulirapo
firmware: Mapulogalamu osungidwa mpaka kalekale pa chipangizo cha hardware (monga BIOS)
overclocking: Kuthamanga kwa CPU pa liwiro lalikulu kuposa momwe amafunira
khodi yokonza zolakwika: Njira yodziwira ndi kukonza zolakwika mu RAM
kuphedwa mwadongosolo: Njira pomwe CPU imagwiritsa ntchito malangizo m'njira yabwino kwambiri
quantum computing: Kugwiritsa ntchito mfundo za quantum mechanics pakuwerengera
neuromorphic computing: Zomangamanga zoyendetsedwa ndi ubongo zopangidwira ntchito za AI
